sys_ui_macro.name: game_verification
sys_ui_macro.xml:
var gameID = jelly.sys_id; var ju = new Util(gameID); var n_categories = ju.hasCorrectNumberOfCategories(); var n_cat_class = (n_categories) ? "complete" : "incomplete"; var players_complete = ju.checkPlayers(); var player_class = (players_complete) ? "complete" : "incomplete"; var n_cards_complete = ju.checkTotalNumberOfCards(); var n_cards_class = (n_cards_complete) ? "complete" : "incomplete"; var n_cards_per_cat_complete = ju.checkProperNumberOfCardsPerCategory(); var n_cards_per_cat_class = (n_cards_per_cat_complete) ? "complete" : "incomplete"; var cat_difficulty_complete = ju.checkCatDifficulty(); var cat_difficulty_class = (cat_difficulty_complete) ? "complete" : "incomplete"; var daily_double_complete = ju.checkDailyDouble(); var daily_double_class = (daily_double_complete) ? "complete" : "incomplete"; var final_jeopardy_complete = ju.checkFinalJeopardy(); var final_jeopardy_class = (final_jeopardy_complete) ? "complete" : "incomplete"; var cat_order_complete = ju.checkCatOrder(); var cat_order_class = (cat_order_complete) ? "complete" : "incomplete"; var nCards = ju.gameGr.n_rows * ju.gameGr.n_categories; var totalCards = nCards.toPrecision(2);
Verification
3 players configured: $[player_class]
$[ju.gameGr.n_categories] categories configured: $[n_cat_class]
Category order set: $[cat_order_class]
$[ju.gameGr.n_rows] cards per category: $[n_cards_per_cat_class]
Difficulty 1-5 per category: $[cat_difficulty_class]
$[totalCards] cards configured: $[n_cards_class]
2 Daily Double cards set: $[daily_double_class]
1 Final Jeopardy configured: $[final_jeopardy_class]
